information.heading: User-Provided Information
information.description: When you register for [Dating App Name], we collect personal information, such as your name, email address, date of birth, gender, and profile pictures. This information is essential for creating and personalizing your user profile.

information.heading: Automatically Collected Information
information.description: In the course of your use of the app, we automatically collect technical information, including but not limited to your device type, IP address, device ID, browser type, operating system, and usage patterns. This data helps us optimize the app's performance, troubleshoot issues, and enhance your overall user experience.

information.heading: Service Enhancement
information.description: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services. This includes tailoring the app's features to your preferences, enhancing usability, and developing new functionalities to meet user needs.

information.heading: Communication
information.description: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services. This includes tailoring the app's features to your preferences, enhancing usability, and developing new functionalities to meet user needs.

information.heading: With Your Consent
information.description: We respect your privacy choices. We will only share your information with others with your express permission.

information.heading: Legal Compliance
information.description: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to a legal request, ensuring compliance with applicable regulations.

information.heading: Access and Correction
information.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal and technical information. This can be done through the app's settings or by contacting our support team.

information.heading: Privacy Preferences
information.description: Manage your account settings and privacy preferences within the app to control the information you share and how it's used.

title: THE TYPES OF PERSONAL DATA WE USE

information.heading: Personal Information
information.description: This includes details like your name, email, date of birth, and gender.

information.heading: Technical Information
information.description: Device-related data such as device type, IP address, device ID, browser type, and operating system.

title: HOW WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL DATA

information.description: Your personal information is never traded, sold, or rented to any parties. Sharing is based on user consent or legal requirements.

title: WHERE WE STORE YOUR PERSONAL DATA

information.description: We store your data securely, implementing measures to prevent unauthorized access. Our commitment is to safeguard your information.
You have control over your personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete it. Exercise these rights through the app or by contacting us.

title: THE SECURITY OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA

information.description: We prioritize the security of your information, employing industry-standard measures to protect against unauthorized access or disclosure.

title: HOW LONG WE KEEP YOUR PERSONAL DATA

information.description: Data retention aligns with legal requirements and is limited to the time necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
Pulse Play is designed for users aged 18 and above. We don't intentionally gather data from users younger than this age.
We may update this policy periodically. Users will be notified of any material changes, and the updated policy will be reflected in the app.
We may update this policy periodically. Users will be notified of any material changes, and the updated policy will be reflected in the app.
information.description1: We use this information to provide personalized services, optimize app performance, and develop features that cater to user preferences. Communication, including newsletters and updates, is done via the provided email address, with users having the flexibility to opt-out.
information.description2: We do not share your information without your explicit consent, except in cases required by law. Users have rights concerning their data, including access, correction, and deletion, all manageable through the app or by contacting our support team
information.description3: Our commitment to data security involves storing your information securely, implementing industry-standard measures against unauthorized access. Your rights and control over your data extend to determining how long we retain your information, aligning with legal requirements.
information.description4: Pulse Play does not target users under 18, ensuring compliance with regulations related to children's online privacy.
information.description5: As we evolve and update our practices, users will be informed of material changes to this policy. For any privacy-related inquiries or concerns, please reach out to us at [contact email].
information.description6: By choosing to use [Dating App Name], you agree to the comprehensive terms outlined in this detailed Privacy Policy.

title: WHO WE ARE AND HOW TO CONTACT US

information.description1: By using Pulse Play, you agree to the terms outlined in this detailed Privacy Policy.
